Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class ResourceLocator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.ResourceLocator
public final class ResourceLocator
extends java.lang.Object
Final class created to find URLs, string used by CLI and Gui classes to display objects.

      colorMarble - color of the marble to be displayed in GUI.
